comment_0: Ok it's a song about a boy treating her like sexual object or with no dignity ei I'm not something to butter up and taste when you get bored also the boy says one day I realize why I don't have any friends she dumps him bc she knows her worth and know he's missing her and writes a 100 letters but she ignores him.

Anyway, she said that months after they broke up she would still find all those notes in her pants and so she got jack of it and took every single pair of pants she had and threw them in the wash, hoping to drown every single note left, thus the line: âYou wrote 100 letters just for me.
